column5: Just wondering if there's any good spots in the gta for smallies.
There's that big lake on the south side. Ontario, I believe its called?
Smallies like structure,lots of structure around Toronto shores. Good luck!!!!
You are best off to pick a large river/creek start at the mouth and walk upstream tossing small spinners into deeper obvious pools.

Lol, sorry I stay away from GTA like its the plague, but if I lived there I'd be all over the harbourfront. I have walked the shore in hamilton harbour and connected with smallies, T.O should be no problem. I hear the mouths of creeks and rivers are good in the summer, makes sense if there is fresh inflow it will attract bait.
K thanks ill give it a shot
